script.description: The script to be converted into speech. Can be formatted with 'Speaker X:' prefixes for multi-speaker dialogues. The model supports English (EN) and Chinese (ZH).

preset.description: The voice preset to use for this speaker. 'Default' selects a default voice. Other presets are language-specific.

speakers.description: List of speakers to use for the script.

cfg_scale.description: CFG (Classifier-Free Guidance) scale. Higher values increase adherence to the text.
